title: Watch: Turns Out CHON Live Shows Are Much Wilder Than Expected [News]
text: @ User Post a comment Despite how fun it looks and how good CHON are, I just don't find the whole crowdsurfing very fitting. I don't know, it seems like they're listening to a different thing. <.< 4 seventh_angel [m] 150 · 2 hours ago · permalink · ↑ reply Anyone who wants to check out their old bassist/frontman Drew can find their Audiotree-filmed 2015 sxsw set on YouTube. I was privileged to see one of their last shows with him. 1 Needs more old bass player 0
